item.title: Center of Gravity Summer 25 - Get Pulled In!
item.description: Center of Gravity returns Wednesdays 3–10 pm as a one-stop for summer success: TA Office Hours (3–8 pm), Food service (until 8pm), CCPD workshops (4–6 pm), RecWell activities (4–6 pm), Mental Floss (6–7 pm), study spaces (4–10 pm), Peer Tutoring (7–9 pm), Sunset & Snacks (8–9 pm). Weekly activities include chair massages, therapy dogs, time-management workshops, away-semester prep, art therapy, book giveaways, networking nights, and more. Visit https://success.studentlife.rpi.edu/cog

item.title: DotCIO announcing Microsoft Windows 10 support ends on 10/14/20025
item.description:
Microsoft Windows 10 support ends on October 14th, 2025. This means that as of this date, most Windows 10 systems will cease to be eligible for support including important security patches. Without appropriate mitigation, Windows 10 systems will be non-compliant with multiple RPI security policies and may be denied access to the campus network in order to reduce risk and maintain a secure cybersecurity posture.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
